findings.title: Owner can set yRaceMaster
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to set yRaceMaster.

findings.title: yRaceMaster address can mint
findings.description: The yRaceMaster address has the privilege to mint tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Fee address can change fee address
findings.description: The fee address has the privilege to change its own address.

findings.title: Owner can add pool
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to add a new pool.

findings.title: Owner can change allocation points of pool
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify allocation points of a pool, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change deposit fee basis points of pool
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the deposit fee basis points of a pool.

findings.title: Owner can change referral bonus basis points
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change referral bonus basis points which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Out of gas exception in includeInReward() function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.

findings.title: Out of gas exception in _getCurrentSupply function
findings.description: The function _getCurrentSupply uses a loop to evaluate total supply and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.
